about_the_game:
Era of Darkness is a dungeon exploration RPG that organizes parties to explore dungeons, collects loot and upgrades facilities and party.

The day the sun lost its light, the age of darkness arrived on the ground. The prosperous kingdom fell, and countless human beings lost their will and went underground. But those who remain on earth still seek human lives, as long as their minds can hold on...

Player's choice of Growth strategy

Blacksmith, General Store, Power Stone, Skill Gem... it's entirely up to you to decide where to use the hard-won resources from Dungeon. Important resources are always scarce.

Build and Strategy based on Party configuration

Every character has her own exceptional abilities, and every enemy has his own weaknesses. Lead the battle to your advantage by identifying the synergy between party members and the weaknesses of your enemies.

The Dark Ages continue...

The world of Era of Darkness continues to expand and develop. Explore new dungeons, Upgrade new facilities, and recruit new teammates. The end of the game is the moment you delete the game.

name: Era of Darkness

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: window 8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GPU supporting OpenGL
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
